timeline.message:
Changes to server configuration 1.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Fixed warning when loading Resource using old properties.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Using new Deprecated config to warn in KeyConfig.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Deprecated ServerConfiguration and remove its use from Helidon production code.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Deprecated ServerConfiguration and remove its use from Helidon test and example code.
Updated examples to use new MediaSupport API.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Fix deprecation and ensure all methods exist on webserver builder.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Archetype updated. Copyright fixes.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

timeline.bodyText: Timeout can be friendlier in case something goes wrong
timeline.author: danielkec
